member.name: M:DBuild.MersenneTwister.#ctor
member.summary: Create a new Mersenne Twister random number generator.

member.name: M:DBuild.MersenneTwister.#ctor(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Create a new Mersenne Twister random number generator with a particular seed.

member.name: M:DBuild.MersenneTwister.#ctor(System.UInt32[])
member.summary: Create a new Mersenne Twister random number generator with a particular initial key.

member.name: M:DBuild.MersenneTwister.NextUInt32
member.summary: Generates a random number between 0 and System.UInt32.MaxValue.

member.name: M:DBuild.MersenneTwister.Next
member.summary: Generates a random integer between 0 and System.Int32.MaxValue.

member.name: M:DBuild.MersenneTwister.Next(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a random integer between 0 and maxValue.
member.param: The maximum value. Must be greater than zero.

member.name: M:DBuild.MersenneTwister.Next(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a random integer between minValue and maxValue.

member.name: M:DBuild.MersenneTwister.NextDouble
member.summary: Generates a random floating point number between 0 and 1.

members.member: A random number generator with a uniform distribution using the Mersenne Twister algorithm.
